author: costin
msg: This is independent of tomcat, it can be used as a CLI or ant
It depends on common-logging, DOM, tomcat-utils ( Introspection )

author: pier
msg: Some more variable localization, now WA_APR_GET appends data to the
variable instead of replacing it, and removed a little useless check
in WA_APR (WA_PATH_DIR already exits if the directory is not found)

author: pier
msg: Localization of variable names within M4 macros (darn, there's no stack)
